author: Philip Bump
title: Why The Analogy Comparing Coronavirus To Car Accident Deaths Is Bad
description: Why shut down over the coronavirus pandemic when we stay open despite car crashes? President Trump was not the first to draw this analogy, nor was it the first time that he had done so. It is, however, a bad analogy.
content:
You look at automobile accidents, which are far greater than any numbers we're talking about, Trump said. That doesn't mean we're going to tell everybody no more driving of cars. So we have to do things to get our country open."
He was not the first to draw … [+5714 chars]
